trends: There have been 148 other sightings in San Antonio
There was one other sighting in San Antonio on or around May 20th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsCraft with 4 lights one at each corner forming a rectangle made a sweeping arch across the sky - banking around from left to right, reshaping into a rhombus, trapazoid and finally into single line as it angled away from me towards to moon low in the sky, until only a single intensely bright bright light remained, and hovering in the sky. Sounded finely tuned, smooth consistant hydrallic like hummmm
